name: Tw20
description:
Tw20 is a platformer where you're tasked to complete 20 levels, spending only 20 seconds in each and with only 20 lives total.

It's made by Mors with music from MiniMacro in a week for the GM20 Game Jam.

The source code is sent to Yoyo Games privately, that's why it's missing here.

Updated to fix a game breaking issue whoops.
